nodes.npc_dialogue: Oh, pardon my clumsy entrance! I was just practicing my dance moves to impress the other spirits... or just give them a good giggle?

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: That's quite the entrance! Are the spirits here that hard to impress?
You must be the spirit with the most legendary dance moves in the afterlife! What's your secret?

nodes.npc_dialogue: Honestly, it's hard to tell if they're impressed or just entertained by my clumsiness! Once, I even tripped over an invisible foot haha!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Dancing wasn't in the spirit guide manual, was it? How did you end up here like this?
Perhaps we need to get you a professional dancing coach, or... an exorcist for your dance demons!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Ah, well, my secret... let’s just say it involves a lot of accidental twirls and hoping my spectral foot finds solid ground!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Accidental twirls? Now that’s a talent! Do you ever crash into other spirits or just the furniture?
Seems like you could use a dance floor upgrade, want a hand shaking things up around here?

nodes.npc_dialogue: I was never much of a dancer in my living days, so now seems like the perfect time to 'kick the bucket' and dance the night away!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Maybe it's time to turn this concourse into the ultimate ghostly dance party!
Let's make sure you get the spotlight you deserve in the spirit talent show!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Haha! Now that's a comedy act I'd love to see. Though a professional coaching session could help more than my clumsy footwork!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Perhaps a dance coach it is! I'll see what I can do to upgrade the dance floor too.
You know, sometimes clumsiness is just another form of art! Keep twirling!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Oh, it's mostly furniture, but I do get a friendly nudge from spirits who have had enough of my silliness.

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Seems like you're already quite famous here—let's give your reputation a little polish with a spruced-up dance spot!
Furniture must love the company! Well, let's make sure the other spirits are tapping to your beat.

nodes.npc_dialogue: Oh, a hand would be wonderful. I think we could all use some excitement beyond my usual tumble!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Fantastic! Let’s work on making your dance dreams a hit performance!
Consider it done! Who knew clumsy could lead to such fun ideas!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Ghostly dance party? I'm in! Just don't expect me to win the competition with my uniquely clumsy style!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Win or not, let's make sure everyone has fun shaking their spectral bones!
I'll take care of the after-party arrangements and you handle the choreography!

nodes.npc_dialogue: The talent show, oh my! With just a little guidance, maybe my twirls could buy me some laughs!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: With that attitude, laughter is guaranteed! Let's get you audition-ready!
I'm sure they'll love it. Spirits could use some comic relief!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Thank you! With a new floor, maybe twirling won't end with me rolling instead!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Let’s have you be the first spirit to test it—dance like there's no after-afterlife!
With a new floor, spirits would be floating on Cloud Nine as well!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Art it is! Here's to a masterpiece in the making, one twirl at a time!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Your artistic presence will be known to all spirits far and wide!
Keep being your clumsy wonderful self—the stage is yours!

nodes.npc_dialogue: And with that polish, I might just become the talk of the spirit world! Thank you, wise manager!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Glad to have helped a spirit rise to the occasion!
Your famous performances are part of what makes this concourse lively!

nodes.npc_dialogue: With all those beats, they'll hear me coming from a mile away—clumsy as I might be.

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Who knew clumsy could become concert-worthy with the right support!
Your rhythm is an integral part of this chaotic harmony!

nodes.npc_dialogue: If I become a hit, we might need a bigger concourse for all my adoring fans!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: In that case, let's prep for a future expansion!
Well, you've certainly got the potential for grand spectacles!

nodes.npc_dialogue: A little tumble carries a lot of laughs with the right audience. Here's to spontaneity!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Here's to this spirit concourse, where every tumble is a moment to cherish!
Let's make sure those spontaneous laughs never end! To laughter forever!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Shake those bones, they say! Thanks for giving me this chance!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: I'd say the honor's mine! Keep those bones shaking!
Next, we'll work on a ghostly conga line!

nodes.npc_dialogue: And I'll make sure every step—even if clumsy—ignites laughter! Thanks for the encouragement!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: This will likely become a staple event for the concourse!
The laughter will lead us to fame!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Audition-ready and laughter-guaranteed. Let's make it a memorable act!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Ready as ever! Bring on the spotlight!
Here's to making lasting memories!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Comic relief at its best—here's hoping I don't dance myself into a giggle fit!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: A master of stage presence through laughter—break a legendary leg!
Well, if you fall, we're here for the comedic rescue!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Dance I'll do, and maybe someday become the ghostly Fred Astaire!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: Sounds like a plan! Keep up those legendary moves!
Until then, may all your dances remain spirited!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Floating on Cloud Nine sounds divine—thank you for everything!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: You're most welcome. May the concourse be forever lively!
It's been a thrill—let's keep spirits up!

nodes.npc_dialogue: Now that’s a dream come true: spirits from all realms laughing with me!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: A dream worth chasing, for sure—let's make it happen!
Let’s bring that glow to the whole afterlife!

nodes.npc_dialogue: The stage is set and ready for endless clumsy artistry! You're the best!

player_dialogue_choices.player_dialogue_choice: No better way to have forever fun!
Here's to a fabulous spirit showcase—keep shining!
